email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel MV IRON MAIDEN for your 150,000MT iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao on CIF terms.

The initial freight rate is USD 18.50 per MT. The laycan is set for October 20-25, and the vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. Demurrage is set at USD 20,000 per day.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 17.50 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the vessel's current position and ETA to Port Hedland?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sarah Connor
Ocean Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The vessel is currently en route to Port Hedland with an ETA of October 18.

Please note that the laycan remains October 20-25, and the demurrage rate is still USD 20,000 per day. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 18.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the loading window and any potential delays?

Best,
Sarah Connor
Ocean Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the loading window is 48 hours. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sarah Connor
Ocean Cargo
